snippet.title: Risk of Rain 2 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Risk of Rain 2 will be PAX West 2018 as part of the Indie MEGABOOTH! Come play Risk of Rain 2 for the first time at booth #859.  http://indiemegabooth.com/project/risk-rain-2/

Risk of Rain 2 is a 3D action rogue-lite that brings you back to the mysterious crash site of the Contact Light. No run will ever be the same with randomized stages, monsters, bosses, items, and more. Play solo or team up with friends in online multiplayer to fight your way through hordes of monsters and find a way to escape..

© Hopoo Games, LLC 2012-2018
